_sText:
Hi, this map is a very unique jail which is located somewhere in space, there are many fun things to do and executions :
- Space skating, showesrs, borixon says, lab, medic. space knifing ring, deagle for deagle, tower, armory, disco, soccer, pool, cinema, electric chair and few secrets.

If a prisoner tries to run and jump to space he will be teleported to a mini jail which can be opened/closed.

This map`s FPS is not really good but i did put much time to improve it, please dont rate it  on the FPS, i will try to improve it a little bit more in future version.

There are 3 random things that can spawn behind the buttons to open cell, Claws which deal damage, jetpack or a laser knife! Theres 50%50 that anything will spawn.

The map has custom animations and music, thats why the file is so big.

You can improve regeneration in Medic by discovering new cures in the lab.

Map runs ok with about 20 people, as i said before ill try to imrpove it later on.

- In next v i will improve the soccer

Huge thanks to Saitek which made a beautiful job making custom decals for the map!
Also huge thanks goes to mighty pete for his awesome skybox!
